Name: Sea Dogs: To Each His Own - Pirate Open World RPG
About the game: JOIN OUR DISCORD 1654 AC. The Caribbean. A place of opportunities and mysteries. Take a role of Charles de Maure - a young French noble who arrived to the New World to assist his brother. What seemed to be a simple family matter, turned into a lifelong adventure. This is a story of the noble idler who became the most powerful man of the Caribbean. Riches, titles, power, romance - the ultimate booty awaits, it is up to you how to get it all. Become a pirate and terrorize the archipelago, take prizes in the sea and plunder cities. Or try to keep hands mostly clean - trade both goods and information, work for the state and help the folk. Get a ship, arm yourself, gather a crew of your dream and find love. The New World is way too vast, too dangerous to explore it alone and there are always consequences for the choices you make! Key Features Naval warfare, both challenging and rewarding Self-reliant and replayable story mode (over 70 hours of gameplay) Remastered in-game art and improved visuals (textures, models etc.) Challenging AI, crafting, trading, fighting, gambling Freeplay mode, endless as an ocean Hundreds of items and weapons
